title-group.article-title: CONSTRUCTING IRREDUCIBLE POLYNOMIALS OVER FINITE FIELDS

abstract.p: We describe a new method for constructing irreducible polynomials modulo a prime number p. The method mainly relies on Chebotarev's density theorem.
